items.text: Adopt a husky and live in a cold country for a while
Watch the northern lights
Visit every continent
Live in a different country for at least a year
Go on a solo road trip with no fixed plan
Scuba dive in a coral reef
Sleep under the stars in a desert
Become a product manager
Build a product that people actually want
Start a company
Invest in a company that changes an industry
Give a talk at a major conference
Mentor someone who goes on to do great things
Work on something used by millions of people
Perform a music gig in front of an audience
Write a book
Learn a musical instrument well enough to play for friends
Make a short film
Create something that outlasts me
Learn calligraphy
Write a poem that moves a stranger
Learn how to code
Learn how to swim
Become conversational in three languages
Read 1000 books
Understand quantum physics well enough to explain it simply
Study philosophy formally
Learn to cook one perfect dish from ten different cuisines
Fall in love
Build a home that feels like a sanctuary
Cook a meal that makes someone cry happy tears
Run a marathon
Develop a meditation practice that sticks
Be at peace with who I am
Make a friend in a country I've never been to
